Class ChauffeurList

  • java.lang.Object
    • ChauffeurList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ChauffeurList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class representing a list of chauffeurs
    Version:
    0.1, 08/12/2016
    Author:
    Krystof Spiller
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addChauffeur(Chauffeur chauffeur)
      Add a chauffeur to the list only if the same chauffeur or a chauffeur with the same employee ID, phone number or email doesn't exist yet.
      void deleteChauffeur(Chauffeur chauffeur)
      Deletes a chauffeur from the list of chauffeurs if it's found.

      Returns ChauffeurList of chauffeurs which are available in a given date interval

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the object of type Chauffeur on the given index of an arraylist only if the index is within the size boundaries of a chauffeurs arraylist

      • getAvailableChauffeurs

        public ChauffeurList getAvailableChauffeurs(DateTime from,
                                            DateTime to)
        Returns ChauffeurList of chauffeurs which are available in a given date interval
        Parameters:
        from - Starting date as an object of type DateTime
        to - Ending date as an object of type DateTime
        Returns:
        the object of type ChauffeurList containing all the chauffeurs which are available in a given date interval

      • mergeWith

        public void mergeWith(ChauffeurList chauffeurList)
        Merges ChauffeurList in the argument to the current ChauffeurList in a way that the chauffeurs are not duplicated
        Parameters:
        chauffeurList - An object of type ChauffeurList

      • addChauffeur

        public void addChauffeur(Chauffeur chauffeur)
        Add a chauffeur to the list only if the same chauffeur or a chauffeur with the same employee ID, phone number or email doesn't exist yet. Prevents duplication.
        Parameters:
        chauffeur - an object of type Chauffeur

      • deleteChauffeur

        public void deleteChauffeur(Chauffeur chauffeur)
        Deletes a chauffeur from the list of chauffeurs if it's found.
        Parameters:
        chauffeur - An object of type Chauffeur
